resources.string:
There are no contacts in your "ImHere" group

That's okay! You can still send this message
by tapping "Send via SMS" below
When you arrive at a custom location\nyou\'ll be able to notify your\"ImHere\" group\nautomatically with a custom message!
Just press and hold to drop a pin!\nYou\'ll be alerted when you\'ve\narrived at your custom location.
